explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a split screen. On the left side, a young man wearing a white T-shirt and black pants is lying on his stomach on the floor, wearing black-rimmed glasses, mouth wide open looking to the right. The floor is dark brown wood, and the walls are white. The TikTok logo and text are in the upper left corner. On the right side, a man wearing sunglasses and a white T-shirt with short black hair and black gloves is holding a large amount of raw ground meat from a meat grinder with both hands. He is in a kitchen with off-white cabinets and appliances. The subtitle "POV: how meat is made" appears at the top of the video.

[0-7] Then, the TikTok logo and text on the left disappear and appear in the lower right corner of the right screen. The man in the left screen slowly moves to the right, his hands constantly grabbing the floor, his expression painful. Then he sticks out his tongue, his eyes roll upwards, and the word "Dead" appears in the picture. The man in the right screen continues to take out the minced raw meat from the grinder.
